_comment: CTO Config Template - Copy to cto-config.json and customize for your project

defaults._comment_docs: Default values for docs() tool - documentation generation workflows
defaults._comment_code: Default values for task() tool - code implementation workflows

_comment_agents: Agent name mappings - friendly names to GitHub App names

_field_documentation.defaults.docs.model: Claude model for documentation generation (e.g., claude-opus-4-20250514, claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022)
_field_documentation.defaults.docs.githubApp: Default GitHub App for docs workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.docs.includeCodebase: Whether to include existing codebase as markdown context
_field_documentation.defaults.docs.sourceBranch: Default source branch to work from
_field_documentation.defaults.code.model: Claude model for code implementation (e.g., claude-opus-4-20250514, claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022)
_field_documentation.defaults.code.githubApp: Default GitHub App for code workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.code.continueSession: Whether to continue previous Claude session by default
_field_documentation.defaults.code.workingDirectory: Default working directory within repository (. for root)
_field_documentation.defaults.code.overwriteMemory: Whether to overwrite CLAUDE.md memory file by default
_field_documentation.defaults.code.docsRepository: Default documentation repository URL (where Task Master docs are stored)
_field_documentation.defaults.code.docsProjectDirectory: Default project directory within docs repository
_field_documentation.defaults.code.service: Default service name for workspace isolation (creates workspace-{service} PVC)
_field_documentation.agents: Mapping of friendly agent names to GitHub App names for easy reference
